BucketName.title: Bucket name
BucketName.description: Specify a DNS-compliant name for a Google Cloud Storage bucket. For bucket naming guidelines, see https://cloud.google.com/storage/docs/naming-buckets.

CreationDate.title: Creation date
CreationDate.description: The date when the bucket was created in ISO 8601 UTC format, YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ
